title: Amumu ult bug
body:
If a support Mikaels' you from the amumu ult, the snare gets removed but you still cant auto attack.

Might be the same with morg spellshield it seemed like i couldnt attack but might've been something else.

replies.body:
He's referring to Mikael's Crucible. 
Passive: gives +2% mana regen
Active: Removes all CC then heals them for 150+10%of max hp(180 sec cool-down)
but what about michaels jackson michaels jordan michaels michaels phelps michaels booblay michaels j fox michaels caine?
They aren't important at the moment (although I wouldn't mind a signed basketball from Michael Jordan)
i wouldnt mind a signed boob from michael 8008lay
